name: Fire & Brimstone
description:
Fire and Brimstone is an old project of mine that I abandoned after a couple of months of working on it but recently I decided to get it working and playable enough to put on itch io as a prototype. 

A lot of content will be missing but you can at the very least play through the existing content and finish the prototype.

NOTE:

Controls

movement - wasd or arrow keys

light attack - Z

dodge - X

special attack C

Interact - Space

Confirm - Enter

Pause - Escape

If you have any questions feel free to leave a comment and I'll try to help as much as I can. Regarding further updates I'm not sure there will be any, the main focus of this was to finish something rather than creating more projects and abandoning the old ones.

Thanks
